snippet: A senior North Korean envoy said Thursday that his country was ready to resume six-party talks on its nuclear program.
abstract: Senior North Korean envoy says his country is ready to resume six-party talks on its nuclear program, but must maintain its readiness in face of joint military exercises between United States and South Korea.
lead_paragraph: A senior North Korean envoy said Thursday that his country was ready to resume six-party talks on its nuclear program.

headline.main: North Korea Ready to Start Nuclear Talks
headline.print_headline: North Korea Ready to Start Nuclear Talks

keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
